title: French first lady apologises for slur after feminist backlash

description: The Supreme Court's recent remarks shed light on how the lavish lifestyles of the affluent play a crucial role in the persistent pollution afflicting Delhi-NCR. The court noted a troubling trend: the elite's refusal to reduce their reliance on polluting transportation and gadgets, despite previous rulings designed to address this environmental crisis.

title: 'This individual definitely targeted Brown University': Police release new footage, suspect details
description: Police have released new details and surveillance footage of a person of interest in the Brown University shooting. The suspect, described as 5'8" with a stocky build, was seen in the area hours before the attack that killed two and injured nine. Authorities confirmed the university was "definitely" targeted, with investigations ongoing into any other potential motives.

description: The Ranveer Singh film Dhurandhar continues its impressive box office run. The movie has set a new record with its second Monday collections, surpassing its opening day earnings. Dhurandhar is nearing Rs 400 crore in India and is projected to cross Rs 550 crore globally. Housefull shows and added screenings indicate its sustained popularity.

title: Five cyber offenders detained under Goondas Act
description: So far, the Cyber Crime Wing has detained 48 cyber crime offenders under the Goondas Act in 2025 and 35 in  2024

title: How is Asia-like artemisinin resistance emerging in Africa?

However, there might be a window of time to act before the problem becomes widespread

The aircraft, en route from Acapulco to Toluca, struck a business rooftop, igniting a massive fire that necessitated the evacuation of around 130 people. Authorities are still working to recover all bodies from the wreckage.

With a unique career bridging fine art and elite sports, she became Christie's first Indian woman auctioneer in New York. Sagar has since broken barriers in Indian sports, notably as the first female auctioneer for the Pro Kabaddi League and the Women's Premier League.

description: Philip Rivers' NFL comeback sparks talk of Tom Brady's potential return. Brady appears focused on his broadcasting career, contrasting with Rivers' recent return to the field.

title: Serena vs Venus Williams Net Worth 2025: Tennis sisters’ wealth compared
description: In 2025, tennis legends Serena and Venus Williams boast significant wealth from their careers and business ventures. Sri Lanka to arrest 1996 World Cup-winning captain Arjuna Ranatunga
description: Sri Lankan authorities are planning to arrest former cricket captain Arjuna Ranatunga on corruption charges related to his time as petroleum minister. He and his brother are accused of altering oil procurement procedures, causing an estimated $5 million loss to the state. His brother has been arrested and released on bail, with a travel ban imposed.

description: SpaceX has voiced concerns over China's recent satellite launches, citing a dangerous 200-meter close approach between a Starlink satellite and a newly deployed Chinese craft. Michael Nicolls of SpaceX highlighted a critical lack of coordination and data sharing among satellite operators as the primary risk in space. This incident underscores the growing need for better communication in orbital operations.

Control of the BMC, Asia's wealthiest civic corporation, holds immense political and economic significance.

Pak-origin gunmen at Bondi: Intifada goes global - the West looks away
description: A Hanukkah celebration at Sydney's Bondi Beach was shattered by a massacre on December 14, 2025. A father and son, linked to extremist networks, opened fire, killing 16 and wounding dozens in a targeted antisemitic attack. This tragedy, Australia's deadliest mass shooting since 1996, highlights the global weaponization of anti-Israel slogans into violence and exposes the fragility of multicultural harmony.

25 years of 'cloud': Salesforce CEO says it's over: Company may rename itself
description: Salesforce CEO Marc Benioff has ditched the word "cloud," a significant shift for the tech pioneer. Focus groups revealed customers now prioritize discussing AI agents over cloud technology. This pivot is underscored by renaming products to "Agentforce" and a massive bet on AI, evidenced by layoffs and substantial deal closures, aiming for $60 billion in revenue by 2030.

Nvidia responds to DeepSeek report; denies claims of ‘banned’ chips behind Jan market rout
description: Nvidia has denied reports that Chinese AI startup DeepSeek is using smuggled Blackwell GPUs, calling the claims "far-fetched." The US has banned these advanced chips from export to China to maintain its AI lead. DeepSeek's previous AI model launch at a lower cost had already rattled US markets and sparked concerns about China's AI progress.

title: Quote of the day by Charles Dickens: 'The most important thing in life is to stop saying…'
description: Charles Dickens, a renowned author, left a legacy of impactful stories and social reform. His quote inspires action over mere wishes. It encourages embracing possibilities as probabilities. This wisdom guides generations to pursue goals with determination. Dickens' message promotes personal and communal growth through will and perseverance.

title: Where does Auston Matthews live? Inside Leafs star’s homes and lifestyle
description: Auston Matthews' net worth is estimated at $30 million in 2025, driven by his substantial NHL salary and lucrative endorsement deals with major brands like Nike and RBC. Beyond hockey, he has strategically invested in startups and actively supports men's health through philanthropy, showcasing a multi-faceted financial profile.

title: MLB trade rumors: Braves eye $325M Rangers star to boost title odds
description: Atlanta Braves are reportedly exploring a blockbuster trade for Texas Rangers star Corey Seager, a move that could significantly alter the NL playoff landscape. Despite Seager's hefty contract and a no-trade clause, the Braves see him as a crucial solution for their shortstop woes. This potential deal offers Atlanta elite offense and Texas a chance to rebuild their farm system.

title: Blake Lively calls Taylor Swift 'the dreamiest friend' amid Eras Tour buzz
description: Blake Lively celebrated a business venture amid reports of a strained friendship with Taylor Swift. Swift is reportedly "hurt" and feels used due to Lively's legal issues involving her "It Ends with Us" co-star. Lively's social media post focused on her haircare brand collaboration, pointedly avoiding any mention of Swift, highlighting a careful navigation of public perception and personal relationships.

title: Connor McDavid reacts after Oilers trade Stuart Skinner and Brett Kulak
description: The Edmonton Oilers made a significant roster change, trading goalie Stuart Skinner and defenseman Brett Kulak to the Pittsburgh Penguins for Tristan Jarry and Spencer Stastney. While the move addressed goaltending needs, it was acknowledged as a difficult decision by players like Connor McDavid and Head Coach Kris Knoblauch, who praised the departing players' contributions.
